title: Enhancing Language Learning Effectiveness Through Online Interactive Learning Environments and Metacognitive Support

context.additional_context: For novice learners pursuing medical, legal, or technical careers, applying real-time video conferencing tools and BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately distinguish interaction strategies in online synchronous/asynchronous environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can self-assess and improve their learning process using metacognitive support tools
Learners can reduce learning gaps by over 30% when performing language tasks in environments combining real-time discussions (synchronous) and asynchronous assignment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
